Text.Page:
We need your help. Thulsa's minions surround Habere. Eliminate the Cursed Legion troops in the Vale of Spires.

Report back when you've finished.

You're amazing, . You're a torch that brightens our federation. Now I have hope that peace will come back to this place one day.

Thank you.
Kill those Cursed Legion soldiers before they choke off our supplies!
